novel neural network - based model.from sentence: In this paper , we present a novel neural network - based model for jointly learning POS tagging and dependency paring .

well - known BIST graph - based dependen.with: additional lower - level BiLSTM - based tagging component

joint model.from sentence: Our joint model extends the well - known BIST graph - based dependency parser with an additional lower - level BiLSTM - based tagging component .
